name: 2022 11th International Conference on Knowledge Discovery
content: Publication: Submissions will be peer reviewed by conference committees, and accepted papers will be published in ICKD 2022 Conference Proceedings by IEEE Conference Publishing Services (CPS), which will be included into IEEE Xplore and submitted for indexing by EI Compendex, Scopus, and other major databases. Some extended papers will be recommended to International Journal of Knowledge Engineering for review, and accepted papers will be published in regular issues of IJKE free of charge, which will be indexed by Google Scholar, Crossref, ProQuest, etc.
